title: Lost one game at 0 LP, demoted without warning

replies.body: As others here have mentioned, it's possible to receive a demotion at 0 LP.  The only exception to this is a limited shield which is obtained right after a promotion.  The Ranked Play FAQ provided below provides a solid guide as well as tips on ranked play, but please let us know if you have any questions.

"Demotions are based on your LP and are influenced by your MMR. If your MMR is significantly lower than the average for the current tier or division, every time you lose a game at 0 LP, you run the risk of demotion."
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ#h7q3
You always have a chance of getting demoted if you lose a game at 0 LP unless you had just won a promo series.
